title: The symbols/information should be in contrasting colour and properly illuminated because people with limited vision may be able to differentiate amongst primary colours
clause_text: The symbols/information should be in contrasting colour and properly illuminated because people with limited vision may be able to differentiate amongst primary colours.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The symbols/information should be in contrasting colour and properly illuminated because people with limited vision may be able to differentiate amongst primary colours.
